Faces of tomorrow

Wow, this is a very cool concept. This guy has been around the world
photographing peoples faces in major cities around the world, he then
goes on to arrange composite images of the average male/female faces
from those cities to show the effects of multiculturalism and immigration patterns.
This resonates very strongly with the concept of eigenfaces used
extensively within face recognition research, but in this case with a
much more artistic bent. Below I've shown what sydneyites might look
like in 100 years time.
